isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - ADJUSTMENTS - CAB AIR RIDE SYSTEM (9200/9300/9400 DAY CAB MODELS)

svcproc.title: CAB AIR RIDE SYSTEM (9200/9300/9400 DAY CAB MODELS)
svcproc.para: To adjust cab ride height, measure ride height between the bottom of the upper mounting plate and the top of the lower mounting plate crossmember ( Figure 111). If the dimension does not meet the specified height of 7-3/4 inches (197 mm) for the 9200, 9300, and 9400 day cab models, adjust as necessary using the following procedure.

step1.para: Loosen valve adjuster rod lock bolt ( Item 4, Figure 74).

Move the horizontal adjuster rod ( Item 6, Figure 74) as needed to achieve correct height between the bottom of the upper mounting plate and the top of the lower mounting plate crossmember ( Figure 111).
After correct height is achieved, tighten valve adjuster rod lock bolt ( Item 4, Figure 74).
